message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $12,000 at this time.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
